question: 待機
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>wait</kanji>ing <kanji>machine</kanji> is a machine on <vocabulary>standby</vocabulary>.  This word doesn’t always apply to machines though. It could be a person who’s on standby, in which case you might also say they’re <vocabulary>on call</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
